channel.title: Website idea? thoughts?
channel.description:
So i am planing on creating a website in which it is for people who passed away it would display a random memorial page for someone, also it will have a search bar so you can go to someone memorial page :)
The memorial page would basically display:
Biography B-day Death day Pictures Timeline of person etc
anyone can submit a memorial page and when its approved it will be displayed users will also have a option to randomize

item.title: Website idea? thoughts?
item.dc:creator: @Spades Spades
item.description:
@Spades wrote:

xx matty xx:

You should automatically mine data from local newspapers and such, so that you can auto-populate your database. I see no way that could go wrong.

He would need to source where he got the information from. Some people can be real sensitive about it, and he would need some way of getting the posts taken down, if the family requests it to be removed. It is honestly better for people to just submit it, and he should have them agree to some sort of terms saying that they are a close friend or family. I know for instance in my family, they don’t want that sort of thing to be public news.

I like the idea of a site, but you would also need to somehow prove someone is dead.
